details.author: Lukáš Masařík
details.description: Board game - family friendly, based on books and games, 2-6 players, average game length 45 minutes, languages EN/CZ, suitable from 12 years

details.author: Michal Landa
details.description: Fantasy comic book following mystical sorceress Lizbeth and her adventures beyond the Mist

details.author: Martin Justa
details.description: Best selling book of the year 2022. Dark fantasy adventures following heroes exploring magical Mist which will change the Istea world

details.author: Mist Gate Studios
details.description: Fantasy RPG game from Mist universe, platforms: PC, PlayStation, Xbox

posts.title: New website launched
posts.body: We proudly anounce launching a new website after months in development

posts.title: Mystery of the Mist release
posts.body: Today is the day. Mystery of the Mist role playing game has been released acros PlayStation, Xbox and PC. Don't wait and claim your copy now!

posts.title: MMO release date
posts.body: After years in development, we've made a major progress and release of our upcoming MMORPG game Eternal Mist is closer than ever. Release date has been set up to 15.3.2025!

posts.title: New comic is out
posts.body: New comic series mapping events before Eternal Mist is starting now. First part of the series is out! Next part will be released on monthly bases.
